column6: Comfortability of conversation via text based medium

column17: I recommend e-learning to other students

column18: E learning makes feel better because I don't have to waste my time to travel.
E-learning is good. but due the connectivity issue, it is not practical in some areas in sri lanka.

column18: In my opinion this is the best way since learning within the university is wasting of time since there are lots of unwanted meetings, gatherings, picketing etc.
